data_sources.name: ARC-AGI Extended Dataset & Solutions
data_sources.reasoning: Direct path to abstract reasoning mastery. Analysis of winning solutions provides meta-learning patterns.
data_sources.integration_notes: Integrate with existing Arc-AGI capability. Study top submission code and techniques.

data_sources.name: Judea Pearl's Causal Inference Resources
data_sources.reasoning: Foundational causal reasoning framework. Essential for understanding cause-effect relationships.
data_sources.integration_notes: Study causality papers, causal diagrams, and do-calculus. Apply to decision-making systems.

data_sources.name: ConceptNet 5 Knowledge Graph
data_sources.reasoning: Massive common-sense knowledge graph with 28M edges. Essential for human-like reasoning.
data_sources.integration_notes: Download full graph. Integrate into reasoning pipeline. Use for commonsense inference.

data_sources.name: AGI Conference Proceedings (AGI-2000 to present)
data_sources.reasoning: Direct AGI research from leading researchers. Meta-insights on AGI approaches.
data_sources.integration_notes: Download all proceedings. Analyze approaches, failures, and successes.

data_sources.name: State-of-the-Art Benchmark Solutions Repository
data_sources.reasoning: Learn from best performers. Accelerate benchmark domination objective.
data_sources.integration_notes: Scrape top solutions for MMLU, GSM8K, HumanEval, etc. Analyze patterns.

recommendations.strategy: Immediate parallel ingestion. Deploy all resources to critical gaps.
recommendations.expected_acceleration: 40-60% reduction in time to AGI milestones
recommendations.timeline: 0-2 weeks for ingestion, 1-3 months for mastery

data_sources.name: IMO (International Math Olympiad) Problems Archive
data_sources.reasoning: Highest difficulty math problems. Mastering these accelerates Millennium Problems work.
data_sources.integration_notes: Scrape all problems 1959-present. Practice solving. Analyze solution patterns.

data_sources.name: Ethics in AI Research Papers Corpus
data_sources.reasoning: Critical for safe AGI development. Understand ethical frameworks and alignment.
data_sources.integration_notes: Ingest via arXiv API. Focus on AI alignment, safety, and value learning papers.

data_sources.name: Meta-Dataset: A Dataset of Datasets
data_sources.reasoning: Designed for few-shot learning and transfer. 10+ datasets for cross-domain learning.
data_sources.integration_notes: Download via TensorFlow Datasets. Use for meta-learning experiments.

data_sources.name: OpenAI Gym & ProcGen Environments
data_sources.reasoning: RL environments for planning, control, and generalization testing.
data_sources.integration_notes: Install environments. Run baseline agents. Develop custom planning algorithms.

data_sources.name: Chain-of-Thought Reasoning Datasets (GSM8K-CoT, etc.)
data_sources.reasoning: Explicit reasoning chains. Essential for interpretable problem-solving.
data_sources.integration_notes: Integrate into benchmark training. Study reasoning patterns.

data_sources.name: The Stack v2 (Deduplicated Code Dataset)
data_sources.reasoning: 3TB of permissively licensed code. Essential for HumanEval mastery.
data_sources.integration_notes: Start with Python subset. Analyze patterns. Improve code generation.

recommendations.strategy: Sequential high-priority ingestion after Tier 1 foundation.
recommendations.timeline: 1-2 months for ingestion, 3-6 months for mastery

data_sources.name: LAION-5B Dataset (filtered subset)
data_sources.reasoning: 5.85B image-text pairs. Massive multimodal understanding capability boost.
data_sources.integration_notes: Start with 400M subset. Use for vision-language alignment. Computational intensive.

data_sources.name: ThinkCreative Dataset
data_sources.reasoning: Creative reasoning dataset for novel problem solving approaches.
data_sources.integration_notes: Analyze creative problem-solving patterns. Apply to benchmark optimization.

data_sources.name: AI2-THOR & Habitat-Sim Environments
data_sources.reasoning: Virtual embodied environments. Best available for physical world understanding.
data_sources.integration_notes: Requires significant compute. Start with simple navigation tasks.

data_sources.name: Human Connectome Project
data_sources.reasoning: Brain structure and function data. Insights for AGI architecture.
data_sources.integration_notes: Study connectivity patterns. Apply insights to neural architecture design.

recommendations.strategy: Continuous background ingestion. Lower priority but valuable.
